items.content_html: A lightweight but complete calendar picker react component.
items.title: noxxxxxxxx/calendar: A lightweight but complete calendar picker react component.

items.content_html: ClipX.js is a lightweight JavaScript library for efficient clipboard management, text manipulation, and user feedback. It offers simple copy, cut, and paste operations, basic text formatting, and built-in toast notifications with customizable messages, all in a compact package.
items.title: MrAkshayAS/clipx: ClipX.js is a lightweight JavaScript library for efficient clipboard management, text manipulation, and user feedback. It offers simple copy, cut, and paste operations, basic text formatting, and built-in toast notifications with customizable messages, all in a compact package.

items.title: mugnet/qrcode-certification-system: An initiative lightweight system developed in Laravel with CRUD functionality and generates Certification with QRCode attached to it.

items.content_html: A two-way chat bridge between Hypixel guild chat and a Discord channel. The application utilizes discord.js v14 for communicating with Discord, and mineflayer for communicating with Hypixel.

items.content_html: EBL (esbuild-bundle-lite) is an esbuild-based bundling tool designed for React projects. It provides a lightweight and efficient build process, leveraging the speed of esbuild and the flexibility of custom plugins.
items.title: bennykim/esbuild-bundle-lite: EBL (esbuild-bundle-lite) is an esbuild-based bundling tool designed for React projects. It provides a lightweight and efficient build process, leveraging the speed of esbuild and the flexibility of custom plugins.
